name: PHOENIX CHILDREN'S HOSPITAL
sampleDescriptions: Policies and legislation that may impact the hospital and its operations such as SCHIP/CHIPRA, 340b, children's graduate medical education, disproportionate share hospital funding; Medicaid and health
